Title: Creates city university of New York center for excellence in urban education to enhance the quality of teaching in public schools in N.Y. city
Summary: Creates the city university of New York center for excellence in urban education to enhance the quality of teaching in public schools in NYC; establishes the regents public school teacher loan forgiveness program to allocate awards annually to teachers who agree to teach public school in an area of New York state designated by the board of regents as having a shortage of public school teachers.
LawCode: Add Art 125-C ยง6284, ยง677-b, amd ยง605, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing for the enhancement of the quality of teaching in the public schools in New York city
